price: Um dia, quando se soprar na Trombeta. E reuniremos os criminosos, nesse dia, azuis de medo.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ وَنَحۡشُرُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ يَوۡمَئِذٖ زُرۡقٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: yawma yunfakhu fī al-ṣūri wanaḥshuru al-muj'rimīna yawma-idhin zur'qan
